question:
The powers, privileges and immunities of the members of Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha are absolutely at equal footing with respect to which of the following?
  1. Election and impeachment of the President
  2. Matters related to money bills and finance bills
  3. Election of Vice President
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Rajya Sabha has no power regarding money bill.Money bill is exclusive topic to Lok Sabha.
